label: AmountType
comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

referencedBy.comment: A monetary value accepted for this payment trade settlement.
An original total monetary value of accepted transactions in this financing summary document.
A monetary value of the actual discount in these trade payment discount terms.
A monetary value of the actual penalty in these trade payment penalty terms.
The monetary value of the adjustment added for this cross-border customs valuation.
A monetary value used as the allowance and charge basis on which this trade related tax, levy or duty is calculated.
A monetary value applied to this logistics service charge.
A monetary value of an invoice associated with this supply chain consignment.
A monetary value of the discount on an invoice associated with this supply chain consignment.
The monetary value of the COD (Cash On Delivery) amount to be collected by the carrier upon delivery of this supply chain consignment.
Content, expressed as a monetary amount, for this packaging marking.
A monetary value of the credit available for this trade settlement financial card.
A monetary value of the credit limit for this trade settlement financial card.
A monetary value of the credit note for this header trade settlement.
The monetary value specified for customs purposes in this exchanged declaration.
A monetary value of the debit note for this header trade settlement.
The monetary value of this supply chain consignment item as declared for statistical purposes.
The monetary value of the adjustment deducted for this cross-border customs valuation.
A monetary value of the deduction from this trade related tax, levy or duty.
A monetary value of the total charges, including tariff and non-tariff charges, deferred for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A deposit value specified in these returnable asset instructions.
A monetary value of a disbursement for this logistics service charge.

A monetary value transferred as an equivalent amount in the credit transfer payment in this trade settlement payment monetary summation, such as the amount transferred between debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency of the debtor's account, and transferred into a different currency.
A monetary value of the total of all line amounts, excluding all duties and taxes, being reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value shown on the face of this experience item voucher.
A monetary value of the grand total charge of this trade price.
A total monetary value of grouped transactions in this financing request document.
A monetary value of the total charges, including tariff and non-tariff charges, immediately payable for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A monetary value included in this referenced document.
A monetary value of the total of all insurance charges being reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
The monetary value of the insurance premium for this supply chain consignment.
A monetary value for an invoice for this supply chain consignment item.
The monetary value of the liability in this financial guarantee.
A monetary value used as the line total basis on which this trade related tax, levy or duty is calculated.
A monetary value of a lower price limit of this specified experience item.
The monetary value of the net budget for this procuring project.
A monetary value of all non-tariff charges for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A monetary value added or subtracted from the total invoice price not previously taken into account for this cross-border customs valuation.
A monetary value of a partial payment in these trade payment terms.
A monetary value which constitutes the total product value, excluding tobacco tax, stated for information purposes in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of the loss of weight of a product, such as fresh goods, stated for information purposes in this trade settlement line monetary summation.
A monetary value requested for this payment trade settlement.
A financing monetary value requested for this header trade settlement.
A monetary value which constitutes the retail value, excluding all duties and taxes, stated for information purposes in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of a rounding amount being applied in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of the amount on which this trade related tax, levy or duty has been calculated on a self-assessment basis.
A monetary value of the self-assessed calculated amount of this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The monetary value specified for statistical purposes in this exchanged declaration.
A monetary value of a tariff for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A monetary value of the tax related to this payment trade settlement.
The monetary value of the total budget which includes net amount, taxes, and material and instalment costs for this procuring project.
The total monetary value of all freight and other service charges which are to be collected from the consignee at or after delivery for this supply chain consignment.
The total monetary value for a consignment for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A monetary value of the total deposit fee stated for information purposes in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
The monetary value of total disbursement for this supply chain consignment, such as the amount to be collected by the carrier according to the order given by the consignor.
A monetary value of a total discount reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of a total discount basis reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
A monetary value of the total invoice on which this header trade settlement is calculated.
The total invoice monetary value specified in this exchanged declaration.
A monetary value of a prepaid total reported in this trade settlement header monetary summation.
The total monetary value of all freight and other service charges which have been paid in advance for this supply chain consignment.
A monetary value of the unit of this trade price.
A monetary value of an upper price limit of this specified experience item.
The monetary value of the basis on which the valuation is, or will be, calculated for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
